name: Wicked Wicker
description:
Welcome to Wicked Wicker, my submission for the RIT Game Design Club 2021 Halloween Game Jam!

I made this in Godot with not a whole lot of time because I also needed to write an essay.

I got a moving character, that's about it. Their name is Mecker. I looked it up to make sure that isn't a bad word in any language and found a Wiktionary article saying that it's German for a goat bleating or whining, which I think fits the character pretty well. https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/meckern#German

It is a puzzle game because it's a puzzle how I was able to submit this on time.
